cards.rules_text:
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

Pay twice X [i]Interest[/i], Sacrifice a Potion: Create X+1 Treasure tokens.
Sylvia can partner with any legendary creature or Planeswalker that can be your Commander.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

Whenever you gain [i]Interest[/i], you may draw a card. If you do, Quinn deals 1 damage to any target.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure token: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less and put it into play under your control tapped.

Haste, Vigilance
[i]Heroic[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Mint, put two +1/+1 counters on her.
Pay 2 [i]Interest[/i]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until end of turn.

Whenever you draw a card, you may pay 1 [i]Interest[/i] and 2 life to draw another card. The [i]Interest[/i] and life costs double each time you have activated this ability this turn.
Whenever an opponent searches a library, they must sacrifice a nonland permanent. You may then put that permanent from the graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

Flying
Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life.
{T}, Discard a card: Gain 3 [i]Interest[/i].

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, gain 3 [i]Interest[/i].
{G}, {T}: Search your library for a card with a basic land type and put it into play tapped. Activate this ability only if your life total is equal to or greater than your starting life total.

Lifelink, vigilance
You may play an additional land each turn.
{T}, Pay 4 [i]Interest[/i]: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put the card on top.

Deathtouch
Ward—Discard 2 cards
Modal spells you control have “Choose one or more” and “Escalate—Pay 2 [i]Interest[/i]”
Anytime a creature you control deals noncombat damage to another creature, create a Treasure token.

At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, create a Treasure token.
Pay 3 [i]Interest[/i]: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

At the beginning of each end step, you gain life equal to the number of [i]Interest[/i] counters you gained this turn.
{T}, Sacrifice three Treasure tokens: You may cast an artifact card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

Add {B}{B}.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, add {B}{B}{B} or {W}{W} instead.

As an additional cost to play Shock Factor, pay X [i]Interest[/i].
Shock Factor deals X damage to any target.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, Shock Factor deals X+2 damage instead.

As an additional cost to play Keep It Simple, discard two cards.
Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i], then deal 2 damage to target creature.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, you may draw a card.

You and permanents you control gain hexproof until your next end step.
Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i].
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, creatures your opponents control cannot attack you until your next end step.

[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, the next time a source you control would deal damage, double that damage. Additionally, the next time you would gain life this turn, you gain double that amount of life instead.

Vanishing 2
Whenever you gain interest, you may draw a card.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, Lipstick enters the battlefield with an extra time counter on it.

Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. This effect cannot be prevented.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, it costs {2} less to cast.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, counter target spell. Then, remove all Stun and -1/-1 counters from creatures you control and all Poison counters from yourself.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, you may pay X [i]Interest[/i] and X life. The next two spells you cast cost {X} less to cast.

Target creature you control gains +1/+2 until end of turn.
[i]Opener[/i] — If this is the first spell you've cast this turn, that creature also gains lifelink until end of turn.

Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i].
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. Create a Treasure token for every 4 [i]Interest[/i] counters removed this way.
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. For every 2 [i]Interest[/i] counters removed this way, Hustle deals 1 damage to any target.
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {1} for every 2 [i]Interest[/i] counters removed this way.
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. Creatures you control gain +1/+1 until end of turn for every 2 [i]Interest[/i] counters removed this way.
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for every 2 [i]Interest[/i] counters removed this way.
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. Each opponent discards a card for every 2 [i]Interest[/i] counters removed this way.

Gain 5 [i]Interest[/i].
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. For every 3 [i]Interest[/i] removed this way, Zeal deals 1 damage to target creature and you gain 1 life.

Gain 3 [i]Interest[/i].
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. For every 3 [i]Interest[/i] removed this way, draw a card and lose 1 life.

Gain 3 [i]Interest[/i].
Remove all [i]Interest[/i] from yourself. Then, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for every 3 [i]Interest[/i] removed this way. That creature fights target creature you don't control.

Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i]. If mana from another spell was spent to cast Reel ‘Em In, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
You gain hexproof from target spell or ability until end of turn.
Draw a card.
Draw three cards.
Copy target spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. Then, shuffle that spell into your library.
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i] for every 2 damage you or sources you control have dealt this turn.
Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
Until your next end step, whenever you cast a spell, draw a card and lose 1 life.
Whenever an opponent plays a spell, you gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].

Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
Draw a card.
Exile the top 3 cards of your library. Put any of them that raise [i]Interest[/i] into your hand.

If a source would deal noncombat damage to a player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.
Whenever a source you control deals 4 or more damage to a player, gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an Investment counter on Compound [/i][i]Interest[/i][i]. Then, gain 1 [i]Interest[/i] for each Investment counter on Compound [/i][i]Interest[/i][i].
Each player exiles the top card of their library. Until your next turn, players can play cards that they own in exile. Whenever they do, you gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].

Untap target creature. It gains hexproof, indestructible, and reach this turn.
Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i].

As an additional cost to cast this card, discard a card.
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].

Target creature gets +2/+0 and first strike until end of turn.
[i]Hellbent[/i] — If you have no cards in hand, you gain 4 [i]Interest[/i].

As long as you have no other cards in hand, you may cast Eye on the Prize without paying its mana cost.
Target creature gains hexproof and indestructible this turn.
Destroy all enchantments that you don't control that are attached to target creature that you control.
Spells and abilities your opponents control cannot force you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents.

Each player must sacrifice a nonland permanent.
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
Each player's life total becomes 20.
Whenever you would be dealt damage, you are dealt half that much damage instead.

You may pay 6 [i]Interest[/i] instead of paying for this card's mana cost.
Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out.
Exile Strategic Withdrawal.
Each opponent may sacrifice a creature. If they do not, you gain 2 [i]Interest[/i] and draw a card. Then repeat this process for an artifact and an enchantment.

Destroy all enchantments that you don't control.
Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i].

Target creature gets +1/+2 this turn.
Proliferate [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]

Enthusiasm deals 6 damage to any target.
Gain 4 [i]Interest[/i].

Create a Treasure token for each Equipment card you control.
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
Reduce damage dealt to creatures you control by the number of Equipment cards attached to them.

Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
Storm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a Historic spell, create a Treasure token and gain 2 [i]Interest[/i]. [i](Artifacts, Battles, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
Flattery deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Create three Treasure tokens when it dies this turn.

You may discard a card rather than paying this card's mana cost.
Each opponent sacrifices a Modified creature they control. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
Draw two cards, lose 3 life, and gain 4 [i]Interest[/i].
Whenever you are dealt damage by any source, Emotional Minefield deals 1 damage to that sources controller and you gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
Anytime a creature dies under an opponent's control, create a Treasure token and gain 2 [i]Interest[/i].

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Gain 2 life.

You gain 3 life.
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
Proliferate X times. [i](To proliferate, choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]

If you have played seven or more spells this turn, you may pay 9 [i]Interest[/i] instead of paying for this spell's mana cost.
Take an extra turn after this one.
Exile Deep Connection.

Scry 2, then draw a card.
Madness {0} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

[i](A deck may have any number of Basic cards of the same name.)[/i]
Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life.
Draw two cards. Then if your life total is equal to or greater than your starting life total, draw three additional cards.
Shuffle your graveyard into your library. Then, discard your hand and draw that many cards.

Reveal the top card of your library. You may cast it by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard and gain [i]Interest[/i] equal to its mana value.

[i](A deck may have any number of Basic cards of the same name.)[/i]
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i], then gain 1 [i]Interest[/i] for each card named Chorus in your graveyard.
An opponent searches your library for three nonland cards with mana value 2 or less. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Whenever you cast a spell, lose 1 life and add {B} to your mana pool.
Each opponent loses 1 life for each card in your hand. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

You may cast this spell at the beginning of your end step without paying any cost if your life total is 5 or less.
You may not lose the game until your next end step. Take an extra turn after this one.
When Encore is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you lose 5 life, then exile Encore.

Choose one — 
• Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
• Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i], then Proliferate.

As an additional cost to play this card, pay X [i]Interest[/i].
Creatures you control get +X/+X, trample and vigilance this turn.
If X is 0, gain 5 [i]Interest[/i].

Choose one — 
• Destroy target nonland permanent.
• Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

When Batten Down the Hatches enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
You and other permanents you control have hexproof.

You may discard three cards instead of paying this card's mana cost.
Each opponent discards a card.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].”
Umbra armor [i](If enchanted permanent would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)[/i]
Create a token that's a copy of target Enchantment.
When a spell or an ability an opponent controls targets you or a permanent you control, you gain 4 [i]Interest[/i].

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has hexproof and “{T}: Put a shield counter on another target creature.” [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
Umbra Armor

If a creature you control would be destroyed, you may pay {0} to cast Pivot.
Target creature gains hexproof and indestructible this turn.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “Whenever an opponent draws their second card each turn, you may draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.”
Umbra armor

Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, gain 4 life.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, gain 3 [i]Interest[/i].

If Elevator Pitch is in your opening hand, you may play it without paying its mana cost at the beginning of the game.
Gain 1 [i]Interest[/i].
Draw a card.

Draw two cards, then discard a card.
If a source an opponent controls caused you to lose life this turn, gain 3 [i]Interest[/i].

Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
Gain 3 [i]Interest[/i].

You may discard an instant or sorcery card from your hand rather than pay Rehearsed Line's mana cost.
Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Gain 2 [i]Interest[/i].
If a spell or ability an opponent controls would cause you to discard any number of cards this turn, draw that many cards instead.

Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
You gain 1 [i]Interest[/i] for each card you discarded this way.

At the beginning of each upkeep, gain 1 [i]Interest[/i] for each Investment counter on Subliminal Suggestion. Then if it's your turn, draw a card and put an Investment counter on Subliminal Suggestion.

When Silence Cure enters, draw a card.
{2R}, {T}, Sacrifice Silence Cure: You can cast spells this turn, and those spells can't be countered.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Get ready to make some noise! With this eloquence-enhancing elixir, you'll never be silenced again. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Insight Enhancer enters, draw a card.
{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Insight Enhancer: Draw two cards and lose 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Wisdom in a bottle. This potent concoction pries open your third eye, laying bare secrets both natural and arcane.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Potion of Healing enters, draw a card.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Healing: You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Reignite the spark of life! This uncanny elixir can bring you back from the brink of death. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Poison Cure enters, draw a card.
{2B}, {T}, Sacrifice Poison Cure: Remove all counters from target creature or player.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Avoid a toxic lifestyle. This best-in-class potion functions like a universal, preventive antivenom. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Potion of Mana enters, draw a card.
{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Mana: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Taste the magic! With this top-tier tincture, you'll be able to move mountains with your mind. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Curse Cure enters, draw a card.
{2W}, {T}, Sacrifice Curse Cure: You gain shroud until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Your luck's about to change. Rewrite the rules of reality with a potion that lets you purify spells of evil intent.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Potion of Stamina enters, draw a card.
{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Stamina: Target creature gets +3/+3 this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Limitations are strictly optional. With this metabolic marvel, your upper limit is off the charts. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Thunder Tonic enters, draw a card.
{2G}, {T}, Sacrifice Thunder Tonic: You gain protection from green this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Stay grounded when life brings the thunder. Enjoy near-total immunity to shock damage with this masterful potion. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Dowsing Enhancer enters, draw a card.
{1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Dowsing Enhancer: Target creature explores, then explores.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Follow your gut. This peerless potion makes you a veritable magnet for items of magical puissance. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Shadow Tonic enters, draw a card.
{2B}, {T}, Sacrifice Shadow Tonic: You gain protection from black this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Things going bump in the night? Bump right back. With total immunity to dark magic, the only thing to fear in the dark... will be you.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Potion of Speed enters, draw a card.
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Speed: Target creature gains first strike and haste this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Will you be the quick or the dead? This masterful mixture lets you achieve terminal velocity. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Drowsiness Cure enters, draw a card.
{2U}, {T}, Sacrifice Drowsiness Cure: Untap target permanent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Rise and shine! This superlative cure makes sleep temporarily impossible.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Potion of Tolerance enters, draw a card.
{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Potion of Tolerance: Return target creature or artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]There's always room for more potions. This masterwork allows you to enjoy the benefits of a cast-iron stomach.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Radiation Tonic enters, draw a card.
{2W}, {T}, Sacrifice Radiation Tonic: You gain protection from white this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Fear no fallout. First-rate hazmat shielding prevents magical radiation from ruining your day, even at ground zero.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Fire Tonic enters, draw a card.
{2R}, {T}, Sacrifice Fire Tonic: You gain protection from red this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The world's on fire. Don't get burned! This top-tier tonic makes you temporarily fireproof. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Seeking Enhancer enters, draw a card.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Seeking Enhancer, Discard a card: Draw two cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Seek, and you shall find. Gaze through the mists of time to unfailingly locate the objects of your desire! [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Sight Enhancer enters, draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Sight Enhancer: Scry 2, then draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Keep your eyes on the prize. Find a needle in a haystack at a hundred yards with this unrivaled sight-enhancing concoction.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Ice Tonic enters, draw a card.
{2U}, {T}, Sacrifice Ice Tonic: You gain protection from blue this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Don't let life give you the cold shoulder. Shrug off frostbite with the best elemental protection that money can buy.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Petrification Cure enters, draw a card.
{2G}, {T}, Sacrifice Petrification Cure: Destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Stay limber! This monumental mixture enhances muscle tone and flexibility so that you can be statuesque, not statuary.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Alertness Enhancer enters, draw a card.
{1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Alertness Enhancer: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Roll for initiative. Finding what you're looking for is easy with the mystic metaconsciousness this potion provides. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Owl enters with five Debt counters on him. When Owl has no more Debt counters, transform him.
Whenever you cast a spell, gain 1 [i]Interest[/i] for each of that spell's colors.
Sacrifice a Treasure token: Remove a Debt counter from Owl.
cards.rules_text2: Pay twice X [i]Interest[/i], {T}: Search your library for a historic permanent with mana value X or less, reveal it, shuffle, then put it on top of your library. [i](Artifacts, Battles, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.
Place your [i]Interest[/i] counters in this area.
